title: 7 - Cranky Mayors, Pink Hairs and Shoelace Cares (8.20.12)
description: An especially antsy crowd turns Harmontown's meeting into a flippin' town meeting, pushing our fearless leader from musings on infidelity to contemplations of suicide. Plus: Dungeonmaster Spencer unveils the boys' characters!
lastTitle: 6 - Atonement with the Mannequins and Butts (8.16.12)
